mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, notice_img, notice_category, groups) values(resetnotice_seq.nextval,#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4},#{param5}, resetnotice_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select notice_no, notice_title, to_char(notice_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')notice_time, notice_content, notice_img, notice_category from notice order by groups DESC
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title=#{param1}, notice_content=#{param2}, notice_img=#{param3}, notice_writer=#{param4}, notice_time=SYSTIMESTAMP, notice_category=#{param5} where notice_no=#{param6}
mapper.insert: insert into personal_qna (personal_no, personal_title, personal_content, personal_img, personal_name, personal_id, personal_email,personal_category) values (personal_no.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7})
mapper.select: SELECT swindle_no, swindle_title, TO_CHAR(create_at, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS create_at FROM ( SELECT swindle_no, swindle_title, create_at FROM swindle ORDER BY dbms_random.value) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT swindle_no, swindle_title, TO_CHAR(create_at, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS create_at from swindle order by swindle_no desc

select * from ( select rownum rn,A.* from( SELECT swindle_no, swindle_title, TO_CHAR(create_at, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS create_at from swindle order by swindle_no desc )A) where rn between #{start} AND #{end}

select * from ( select rownum rn,A.* from( SELECT personal_no, personal_title, TO_CHAR(create_at, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS create_at, answer_state, personal_category from personal_qna order by personal_no desc )A) where rn between #{start} AND #{end}
select swindle_no, swindle_title, to_char(create_at,'yyyy/MM/dd')create_at, case_content, case_img, swindle_cnt, victim_id, suspect_id from swindle where swindle_no=#{param1}
mapper.update: update swindle set swindle_cnt=swindle_cnt+1 where swindle_no=#{param1}
update swindle set swindle_title=#{param1}, case_content=#{param2}, case_img=#{param3}, victim_id=#{param4}, suspect_id=#{param5}, update_at=SYSTIMESTAMP where swindle_no=#{param6}
mapper.select: select swindle_no, swindle_title, to_char(create_at,'yyyy/MM/dd')create_at from swindle where swindle_title like '%' || #{param1} || '%'

select * from(SELECT swindle_no, LEAD(swindle_no,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY swindle_no) AS next, LAG(swindle_no,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY swindle_no) AS last, swindle_title, LEAD(swindle_title,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY swindle_no) AS nexttitle, LAG(swindle_title,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY swindle_no) AS lasttitle
FROM swindle order by swindle_no DESC) WHERE swindle_no = #{swindle_no}
select personal_no, personal_title, to_char(create_at,'yyyy/MM/dd')create_at, answer_state, personal_category from personal_qna where personal_id = #{param1}
select swindle_no, swindle_title, to_char(create_at,'yyyy/MM/dd')create_at from swindle where victim_id = #{param1}
select personal_no, personal_title, to_char(create_at,'yyyy/MM/dd')create_at, personal_content, personal_img, personal_id, answer_state, answer_content from personal_qna where personal_no=#{param1}
mapper.update: update personal_qna set answer_content=#{param2}, answer_state=#{param3} where personal_no=#{param1}
mapper.select: select personal_no, personal_title, to_char(create_at,'yyyy/MM/dd')create_at, answer_state, personal_category from personal_qna
select swindle_no, swindle_title, to_char(create_at,'yyyy/MM/dd')create_at from swindle
